details.title: Optical Simulation of Radar Ambiguities
details.abstract: Coherent optical systems, because of their basic similarity to coherent radar systems, can be used to simulate many of the characteristics of the latter. This paper discusses the use of a coherent optical system for the simulation of the range and azimuth ambiguities that sometimes occur in radar systems. The optical configurations for implementing these simulations are described in detail, and extensive experimental results are presented.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
